_header: Look ere thine heart be set / Look thou woo ere thou be knit
_description: A song against marrying unadvisedly — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Man bewar of thin wowyng / For weddyng is the longe wo’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Loke er thin herte be setLok thou wowe er thou be
                    knet…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…And vnder the tayl they ben ful tekylA twenty deuele name let
                    hem goo
